aircraft.value: Talon Swift - AC-7272-372 at Sector West Station

defect_observed.value: Cabin pressurization rate anomaly. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Foreign object damage to critical surface

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective De-icing System component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 20/06/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 23/06/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 25/06/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 23/06/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 27/06/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon
